name: Dice Confrontation (Parrexion Games)
description:
Download link will be available at release on August 30th 

Description:

Dice Confrontation is a collectible dice game (CDG) where people build armies using dice and face off against each other much like a card game.

You take turns drawing dice and playing them as Soldiers or powerful Tactics to gain the upper hand and win the war represented by the game.

The goal of the game is to win two out of the three battles by having stronger (higher valued) dice on your side of the field.

The game comes with a fully playable tutorial to quickly learn how to play and get you on board.

Features:

  • PC and Android version with cross-play.
  • 270 different dice of 6 different colours with their own flair.
  • Play against other players during the weekend.
  • Play against the AI to practice your skills and earn gems any time.
  • Gather a collection of dice by opening booster packs for gems.
  • A fully playable tutorial for learning the game.
  • Build your own decks of dice to show your style of play.

Server:

The Server will be online the whole release week!

The server is only a free server which means that it can only be online during the weekends between Friday 0:00 and Monday 0:00 (UTC). When the server is not available you can instead play against the AI and still gain rewards. The only difference is that you cannot play against other players during the weekdays.

If you want to find people to play against, there is a Discord server accessible from the game which you can use to talk to other players.
